title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Maintenance Management Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational engineering and mathematics knowledge, ability to utilize basic digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Integrated training course for pre-service and in-service teachers to develop maintenance management competencies across various fields. Designed by combining mobile-based self-directed learning and formative assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can understand core areas of maintenance management (e.g., engineering, safety, finance) and analyze practical cases within one week.
Learners can complete maintenance process simulations with a formative assessment pass rate of over 80% in a mobile environment.
Learners can propose three or more maintenance problem-solving strategies through team-based online discussions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
